des:
Reolink, a global innovator in home security and camera solutions, now works seamlessly with Alexa.
You can watch real-time videos from your Reolink cameras with voice commands on Amazon Alexa devices, such as Echo Show, Echo Spot, and so on. Just say "Alexa, show me the bedroom camera" to check what’s going on there or “Alexa, show the front door” to see who’s at the door. 
Similarly, you can voice control home electronic appliances connected to Reolink Smart WiFi Plug wherever you are. Just say “Alexa, turn on the bedroom light” and it’s done.

To get started, please make sure you add your Reolink device to Reolink App and have it set up. Open Smart Home page and enable the device you want to control with Alexa in Reolink App. Then you'll need to add Reolink as a skill in your Alexa App and simply link your Alexa and Reolink account.

Now try these commands to view or stop viewing live feed from Reolink camera:
"Alexa, show the backyard camera."
"Alexa, hide the backyard camera."


To voice control the light connected to Reolink Smart WiFi Plug, just say:
"Alexa, turn on the bedroom light."
"Alexa, turn off the bedroom light."



Currently the following Reolink devices are compatible with Alexa:
